definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[חוד]] (√ of foll.; relation to I. [[חוד]] dub.; cf. As. sîdîtu, Ar. za0da (w), Aram. [[זְוֶדָה]], zwodo0, Palm. [[זוד]], all provisions (esp. for journey); in Thes=I. [[חוד]]; on game as early food of nomads v. RS:Sem. i. 205; 2nd ed. 222f. cf. Doughty:Arab. Des. i. 70, 326, 562; [[ז]] (Ar. Aram.) is then secondary).
